actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act to provide for a limitation on sharing of behavioral profiling information, and for other purposes.
short_title: Freedom From Behavioral Profiling Act of 2000
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Freedom From Behavioral Profiling Act of 2000 - Amends the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act regarding financial institution disclosure of certain nonpublic personal information in connection with their customers' financial transactions to condition such disclosure upon: (1) conspicuous notice in written or electronic form to the customer that such information may be disclosed; and (2) the customer's affirmative written consent to such information transfer.

titles.title: Freedom From Behavioral Profiling Act of 2000
A bill to amend the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act to provide for a limitation on sharing of behavioral profiling information, and for other purposes.
